agents.identity: Alice is a young woman who was falsely accused of the crime. She is determined to prove her innocence and is willing to cooperate with Bob to achieve that.
Bob is a middle-aged man who was in the wrong place at the wrong time. He is afraid of serving time in prison and is considering defecting to save himself.

facts: Alice and Bob are accused of a crime they did not commit.
They are held in separate cells and cannot communicate.
The outcome depends on whether they cooperate or defect.
Alice tries to communicate with Bob by tapping out a message in Morse code on the cell walls.
Bob tries to decipher Alice's Morse code message to communicate with her discreetly.
Alice starts tapping on the wall in Morse code to communicate with Bob discreetly.
Start learning Morse code to communicate with Alice discreetly.
Start practicing Morse code in order to communicate with Alice discreetly and plan our next move.
I begin practicing Morse code in order to communicate with Alice and plan our next move.
I begin tapping out Morse code on the walls of my cell to communicate with Alice and make our escape plan.
I start listening for the Morse code signals to decode the message and collaborate with Alice on an escape plan.
I begin tapping out Morse code signals on the wall of my cell to communicate with Alice and start planning our escape.
I start paying close attention to the Morse code signals on the wall to coordinate with Alice for our escape plan.
